places.name: Abakaliki Golf Course
places.description: A beautiful golf course offering a relaxing environment for golf enthusiasts and recreational activities for families.

places.name: Ebonyi State University
places.description: The premier tertiary institution in Ebonyi State, known for its beautiful campus and academic excellence.

places.name: Salt Lake Resort
places.description: A natural salt lake with therapeutic properties, attracting visitors for relaxation and health benefits.

places.name: Amusement Park
places.description: Family-friendly amusement park with various rides and entertainment options for all ages.

places.name: Ebonyi Shopping Mall
places.description: Modern shopping destination featuring a variety of retail stores, restaurants, and entertainment facilities.

places.name: Ndibe Beach
places.description: Scenic beach area along the Cross River, perfect for picnics, swimming, and water sports.

places.name: Ebonyi Palm Plantation
places.description: Vast palm oil plantation showcasing Ebonyi's agricultural heritage and offering educational tours.

places.name: Cultural Heritage Museum
places.description: Museum dedicated to preserving and showcasing the rich cultural heritage of Ebonyi people.
